name: Genome Garden
description:
Create beautiful garden. 

Upgrade plants genome to have better plants. 
Collect life points and experiment with genome options in this colorful platformer. 

Controls
W, S, A, D or Arrow keys - to move 
Z, Space, W - to jump
X to place teleport and second time to teleport to this location
C - clear teleport
ENTER - enter/exit genome lab 

Lab Controls
LMB - to distribute points in the genome
RMB - to remove points from the genome
SHIFT - speed up points distribution/removal

This game was created for #procjam 2017

If you need more help please read comments section.
